item.title: 在某些方面，英国农村的变化比其城市更快
item.description: In some ways, rural Britain is changing faster than its citiesvia In some ways, rural Britain is changing faster than its citi…Holidaymakers, including American vice-presidents, are drawn to rural Britain partly because it seems to change so little.这些村庄是茅草和古朴的。农场商店（即使不是价格）可能是老式的。景观是“永恒熟悉的”…… < /blockquote>
